TITLE: WELCOME TO THE OL-in-One Compass
INTRO_DEF:
Ocean Literacy (OL)
is the understanding of
the Ocean-humanity
mutual influence
INTRO_P:
Ocean Literacy is based
on 7 Scientific Principles.
INTRO_Pe:
Science is just one of the
7 Perspectives from
which OL can be seen.
INTRO_D:
Knowledge is just one of
the 10 Dimensions
through which OL can be
pursued.
